subject: Horse Racing
Steroids
Horses
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: At virtually every racetrack in America and in the barns of some of the sport’s most successful trainers, there are horses who have been treated with anabolic steroids.
snippet: At virtually every racetrack in America and in the barns of some of the sport’s most successful trainers, there are horses who have been treated with anabolic steroids.
